name: Star Storm
description:
Star Storm is a fast paced, Local Co-op, Card game that involves building your ships with a few upgrades and then sending them against your enemy! In this rock-paper-scissors style format, the stats dictate which ship survives!
The triangle works as follows!
Attack > Speed
Defense > Attack
Speed > Defense

For example:
1 Speed subtracts 1 Defense from the enemy ship!
If any stat reaches 0, that ship is destroyed!

Pay attention to the stats of the cards being thrown at you! You'll need to decide whether you want to sabotage the card, or overwhelm it with a superior build! Lets get started!

Player 1 Controls:
Select ▲ = W
Select ▼ = S
Confirm = D
Launch Early = A

Player 2 Controls:
Select ▲ = Up Arrow ↑
Select ▼ = Down Arrow ↓
Confirm = Left Arrow ←
Launch Early = Right Arrow →

Each round, cards will be upgraded (Spread across multiple cards for the winner, with a more powerful booster for the runner up!)

Good luck! And let fly in the chaotic battles of STAR STORM!

We used Unity, Gimp and created our own sound effects. (One sound effect taken from a JonTron video)

Made with MadUnicycle, Taicion and myself.
